entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
